00076         public static
00077         double
00078         Hypot(
00079             double a,
00080             double b
00081             )
00082         {
00083             if(Math.Abs(a) > Math.Abs(b))
00084             {
00085                 double r = b / a;
00086                 return Math.Abs(a) * Math.Sqrt(1 + r * r);
00087             }
00088 
00089             if(!Number.AlmostZero(b))
00090             {
00091                 double r = a / b;
00092                 return Math.Abs(b) * Math.Sqrt(1 + r * r);
00093             }
00094 
00095             return 0d;
00096         }

00101         [CLSCompliant(false)]
00102         public static
00103         long
00104         IntPow(
00105             long radix,
00106             uint exponent
00107             )
00108         {
00109             // TODO: investigate for a better solution
00110             return (long)Math.Round(Math.Pow(radix, exponent));
00111         }

00113         #region Base 2 Integer Exponentiation
00114 
00119         public static
00120         int
00121         IntPow2(
00122             int exponent
00123             )
00124         {
00125             if(exponent < 0 || exponent >= 31)
00126             {
00127                 throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException("exponent");
00128             }
00129 
00130             return 1 << exponent;
00131         }
00132 
00136         public static
00137         int
00138         IntLog2(
00139             int x
00140             )
00141         {
00142             if(x <= 65536)
00143             {
00144                 if(x <= 256)
00145                 {
00146                     if(x <= 16)
00147                     {
00148                         if(x <= 4)
00149                         {
00150                             if(x <= 2)
00151                             {
00152                                 if(x <= 1)
00153                                 {
00154                                     return 0;
00155                                 }
00156 
00157                                 return 1;
00158                             }
00159 
00160                             return 2;
00161                         }
00162 
00163                         if(x <= 8)
00164                         {
00165                             return 3;
00166                         }
00167 
00168                         return 4;
00169                     }
00170 
00171                     if(x <= 64)
00172                     {
00173                         if(x <= 32)
00174                         {
00175                             return 5;
00176                         }
00177 
00178                         return 6;
00179                     }
00180 
00181                     if(x <= 128)
00182                     {
00183                         return 7;
00184                     }
00185 
00186                     return 8;
00187                 }
00188 
00189                 if(x <= 4096)
00190                 {
00191                     if(x <= 1024)
00192                     {
00193                         if(x <= 512)
00194                         {
00195                             return 9;
00196                         }
00197 
00198                         return 10;
00199                     }
00200 
00201                     if(x <= 2048)
00202                     {
00203                         return 11;
00204                     }
00205 
00206                     return 12;
00207                 }
00208 
00209                 if(x <= 16384)
00210                 {
00211                     if(x <= 8192)
00212                     {
00213                         return 13;
00214                     }
00215 
00216                     return 14;
00217                 }
00218 
00219                 if(x <= 32768)
00220                 {
00221                     return 15;
00222                 }
00223 
00224                 return 16;
00225             }
00226 
00227             if(x <= 16777216)
00228             {
00229                 if(x <= 1048576)
00230                 {
00231                     if(x <= 262144)
00232                     {
00233                         if(x <= 131072)
00234                         {
00235                             return 17;
00236                         }
00237 
00238                         return 18;
00239                     }
00240 
00241                     if(x <= 524288)
00242                     {
00243                         return 19;
00244                     }
00245 
00246                     return 20;
00247                 }
00248 
00249                 if(x <= 4194304)
00250                 {
00251                     if(x <= 2097152)
00252                     {
00253                         return 21;
00254                     }
00255 
00256                     return 22;
00257                 }
00258 
00259                 if(x <= 8388608)
00260                 {
00261                     return 23;
00262                 }
00263 
00264                 return 24;
00265             }
00266 
00267             if(x <= 268435456)
00268             {
00269                 if(x <= 67108864)
00270                 {
00271                     if(x <= 33554432)
00272                     {
00273                         return 25;
00274                     }
00275 
00276                     return 26;
00277                 }
00278 
00279                 if(x <= 134217728)
00280                 {
00281                     return 27;
00282                 }
00283 
00284                 return 28;
00285             }
00286 
00287             if(x <= 1073741824)
00288             {
00289                 if(x <= 536870912)
00290                 {
00291                     return 29;
00292                 }
00293 
00294                 return 30;
00295             }
00296 
00297             // since int is unsigned it can never be higher than 2,147,483,647
00298             return 31;
00299         }

00304         public static
00305         int
00306         CeilingToPowerOf2(
00307             int value
00308             )
00309         {
00310             return value <= 0
00311                 ? 0
00312                 : IntPow2(IntLog2(value));
00313         }
00314 
00318         public static
00319         int
00320         FloorToPowerOf2(
00321             int value
00322             )
00323         {
00324             int log = IntLog2(value);
00325 
00326             int retHalf = log == 0
00327                 ? 0
00328                 : IntPow2(log - 1);
00329 
00330             return retHalf == value >> 1
00331                 ? value
00332                 : retHalf;
00333         }

00337         #region Number Theory
00338 
00343         public static
00344         long
00345         Gcd(
00346             long a,
00347             long b
00348             )
00349         {
00350             long rem;
00351 
00352             while(b != 0)
00353             {
00354                 rem = a % b;
00355                 a = b;
00356                 b = rem;
00357             }
00358 
00359             return Math.Abs(a);
00360         }
00361 
00374         public static
00375         long
00376         Gcd(
00377             long a,
00378             long b,
00379             out long x,
00380             out long y
00381             )
00382         {
00383             long rem, quot, tmp;
00384             long mp = 1, np = 0, m = 0, n = 1;
00385 
00386             while(b != 0)
00387             {
00388                 quot = a / b;
00389                 rem = a % b;
00390                 a = b;
00391                 b = rem;
00392 
00393                 tmp = m;
00394                 m = mp - quot * m;
00395                 mp = tmp;
00396 
00397                 tmp = n;
00398                 n = np - quot * n;
00399                 np = tmp;
00400             }
00401 
00402             if(a >= 0)
00403             {
00404                 x = mp;
00405                 y = np;
00406                 return a;
00407             }
00408             else
00409             {
00410                 x = -mp;
00411                 y = -np;
00412                 return -a;
00413             }
00414         }
00415 
00420         public static
00421         long
00422         Lcm(
00423             long a,
00424             long b
00425             )
00426         {
00427             // TODO: Direct Implementation for preventing overflows.
00428             if(a == 0 && b == 0)
00429             {
00430                 return 0;
00431             }
00432 
00433             return Math.Abs(a * b) / Gcd(a, b);
00434         }

00438         #region Sinc
00439 
00444         public static
00445         double
00446         Sinc(
00447             double x
00448             )
00449         {
00450             if(double.IsNaN(x))
00451             {
00452                 return double.NaN;
00453             }
00454 
00455             if(double.IsInfinity(x))
00456             {
00457                 return 0.0;
00458             }
00459 
00460             double a = Math.PI * x;
00461             double sinc = Math.Sin(a) / a;
00462 
00463             if(double.IsInfinity(sinc) || double.IsNaN(sinc))
00464             {
00465                 return 1.0;
00466             }
00467 
00468             return sinc;
00469         }

00473         #region Factorial, Binomial Coefficient
00474 
00479         public static
00480         double
00481         FactorialLn(
00482             int value
00483             )
00484         {
00485             if(value < 0)
00486             {
00487                 throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException("value", Resources.ArgumentPositive);
00488             }
00489 
00490             if(value <= 1)
00491             {
00492                 return 0.0d;
00493             }
00494 
00495             if(value >= FactorialLnCacheSize)
00496             {
00497                 return GammaLn(value + 1.0);
00498             }
00499 
00500             if(factorialLnCache == null)
00501             {
00502                 factorialLnCache = new double[FactorialLnCacheSize];
00503             }
00504 
00505             return factorialLnCache[value] != 0.0
00506                 ? factorialLnCache[value]
00507                 : (factorialLnCache[value] = GammaLn(value + 1.0));
00508         }
00509 
00510         static double[] factorialLnCache;
00511         const int FactorialLnCacheSize = 2 * FactorialPrecompSize;
00512 
00525         public static
00526         double
00527         Factorial(
00528             int value
00529             )
00530         {
00531             if(value < 0)
00532             {
00533                 throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException("value", Resources.ArgumentPositive);
00534             }
00535 
00536             if(value >= FactorialPrecompSize)
00537             {
00538                 return Math.Exp(GammaLn(value + 1.0));
00539             }
00540 
00541             return factorialPrecomp[value];
00542         }
00543

00591         public static
00592         double
00593         BinomialCoefficient(
00594             int n,
00595             int k
00596             )
00597         {
00598             if(k < 0 || n < 0 || k > n)
00599             {
00600                 return 0.0;
00601             }
00602 
00603             return Math.Floor(0.5 + Math.Exp(FactorialLn(n) - FactorialLn(k) - FactorialLn(n - k)));
00604         }
00605 
00609         public static
00610         double
00611         BinomialCoefficientLn(
00612             int n,
00613             int k
00614             )
00615         {
00616             if(k < 0 || n < 0 || k > n)
00617             {
00618                 return 1.0;
00619             }
00620 
00621             return FactorialLn(n) - FactorialLn(k) - FactorialLn(n - k);
00622         }

00626         #region Gamma Functions
00627 
00632         public static
00633         double
00634         GammaLn(
00635             double value
00636             )
00637         {
00638             double x, y, ser, temp;
00639             double[] coefficient = new double[]{
00640                 76.18009172947146,
00641                 -86.50532032941677,
00642                 24.01409824083091,
00643                 -1.231739572450155,
00644                 0.1208650973866179e-2,
00645                 -0.5395239384953e-5
00646                 };
00647 
00648             y = x = value;
00649             temp = x + 5.5;
00650             temp -= ((x + 0.5) * Math.Log(temp));
00651             ser = 1.000000000190015;
00652 
00653             for(int j = 0; j <= 5; j++)
00654             {
00655                 ser += (coefficient[j] / ++y);
00656             }
00657 
00658             return -temp + Math.Log(2.5066282746310005 * ser / x);
00659         }
00660 
00666         public static
00667         double
00668         Gamma(
00669             double value
00670             )
00671         {
00672             if(value > 0.0)
00673             {
00674                 return Math.Exp(GammaLn(value));
00675             }
00676 
00677             double reflection = 1.0 - value;
00678             double s = Math.Sin(Math.PI * reflection);
00679 
00680             if(Number.AlmostEqual(0.0, s))
00681             {
00682                 return double.NaN; // singularity, undefined
00683             }
00684 
00685             return Math.PI / (s * Math.Exp(GammaLn(reflection)));
00686         }

00691         [Obsolete("Renamed to GammaRegularized; Hence please migrate to GammaRegularized.")]
00692         public static
00693         double
00694         IncompleteGammaRegularized(
00695             double a,
00696             double x
00697             )
00698         {
00699             return GammaRegularized(a, x);
00700         }
00701 
00706         public static
00707         double
00708         GammaRegularized(
00709             double a,
00710             double x
00711             )
00712         {
00713             const int MaxIterations = 100;
00714             double eps = Number.RelativeAccuracy;
00715             double fpmin = Number.SmallestNumberGreaterThanZero / eps;
00716 
00717             if(a < 0.0 || x < 0.0)
00718             {
00719                 throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException("a,x", Resources.ArgumentNotNegative);
00720             }
00721 
00722             double gln = GammaLn(a);
00723             if(x < a + 1.0)
00724             {
00725                 // Series Representation
00726 
00727                 if(x <= 0.0)
00728                 {
00729                     // Yes, I know we've already checked for x<0.0
00730 
00731                     return 0.0;
00732                 }
00733                 else
00734                 {
00735                     double ap = a;
00736                     double del, sum = del = 1.0 / a;
00737 
00738                     for(int n = 0; n < MaxIterations; n++)
00739                     {
00740                         ++ap;
00741                         del *= x / ap;
00742                         sum += del;
00743 
00744                         if(Math.Abs(del) < Math.Abs(sum) * eps)
00745                         {
00746                             return sum * Math.Exp(-x + a * Math.Log(x) - gln);
00747                         }
00748                     }
00749                 }
00750             }
00751             else
00752             {
00753                 // Continued fraction representation
00754 
00755                 double b = x + 1.0 - a;
00756                 double c = 1.0 / fpmin;
00757                 double d = 1.0 / b;
00758                 double h = d;
00759 
00760                 for(int i = 1; i <= MaxIterations; i++)
00761                 {
00762                     double an = -i * (i - a);
00763                     b += 2.0;
00764                     d = an * d + b;
00765 
00766                     if(Math.Abs(d) < fpmin)
00767                     {
00768                         d = fpmin;
00769                     }
00770 
00771                     c = b + an / c;
00772 
00773                     if(Math.Abs(c) < fpmin)
00774                     {
00775                         c = fpmin;
00776                     }
00777 
00778                     d = 1.0 / d;
00779                     double del = d * c;
00780                     h *= del;
00781 
00782                     if(Math.Abs(del - 1.0) <= eps)
00783                     {
00784                         return 1.0 - Math.Exp(-x + a * Math.Log(x) - gln) * h;
00785                     }
00786                 }
00787             }
00788 
00789             throw new ArgumentException(Resources.ArgumentTooLargeForIterationLimit, "a");
00790         }
00791 
00792         #endregion
00793 
00794         #region Digamma Functions
00795 
00800         public static
00801         double
00802         Digamma(
00803             double x
00804             )
00805         {
00806             double y = 0;
00807             double nz = 0.0;
00808             bool negative = (x <= 0);
00809 
00810             if(negative)
00811             {
00812                 double q = x;
00813                 double p = Math.Floor(q);
00814                 negative = true;
00815 
00816                 if(Number.AlmostEqual(p, q))
00817                 {
00818                     return double.NaN; // singularity, undefined
00819                 }
00820 
00821                 nz = q - p;
00822 
00823                 if(nz != 0.5)
00824                 {
00825                     if(nz > 0.5)
00826                     {
00827                         p = p + 1.0;
00828                         nz = q - p;
00829                     }
00830 
00831                     nz = Math.PI / Math.Tan(Math.PI * nz);
00832                 }
00833                 else
00834                 {
00835                     nz = 0.0;
00836                 }
00837 
00838                 x = 1.0 - x;
00839             }
00840 
00841             if((x <= 10.0) && (x == Math.Floor(x)))
00842             {
00843                 y = 0.0;
00844                 int n = (int)Math.Floor(x);
00845 
00846                 for(int i = 1; i <= n - 1; i++)
00847                 {
00848                     y = y + 1.0 / i;
00849                 }
00850 
00851                 y = y - Constants.EulerGamma;
00852             }
00853             else
00854             {
00855                 double s = x;
00856                 double w = 0.0;
00857 
00858                 while(s < 10.0)
00859                 {
00860                     w = w + 1.0 / s;
00861                     s = s + 1.0;
00862                 }
00863 
00864                 if(s < 1.0e17)
00865                 {
00866                     double z = 1.0 / (s * s);
00867                     double polv = 8.33333333333333333333e-2;
00868                     polv = polv * z - 2.10927960927960927961e-2;
00869                     polv = polv * z + 7.57575757575757575758e-3;
00870                     polv = polv * z - 4.16666666666666666667e-3;
00871                     polv = polv * z + 3.96825396825396825397e-3;
00872                     polv = polv * z - 8.33333333333333333333e-3;
00873                     polv = polv * z + 8.33333333333333333333e-2;
00874                     y = z * polv;
00875                 }
00876                 else
00877                 {
00878                     y = 0.0;
00879                 }
00880 
00881                 y = Math.Log(s) - 0.5 / s - y - w;
00882             }
00883 
00884             if(negative)
00885             {
00886                 return y - nz;
00887             }
00888 
00889             return y;
00890         }
00891 
00892         #endregion

00894         #region Beta Functions
00895 
00900         public static
00901         double
00902         Beta(
00903             double z,
00904             double w
00905             )
00906         {
00907             return Math.Exp(GammaLn(z) + GammaLn(w) - GammaLn(z + w));
00908         }
00909 
00914         public static
00915         double
00916         BetaLn(
00917             double z,
00918             double w
00919             )
00920         {
00921             return GammaLn(z) + GammaLn(w) - GammaLn(z + w);
00922         }

00938 
00943         public static
00944         double
00945         BetaRegularized(
00946             double a,
00947             double b,
00948             double x
00949             )
00950         {
00951             if(a < 0.0 || b < 0.0)
00952             {
00953                 throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException("a,b", Resources.ArgumentNotNegative);
00954             }
00955 
00956             if(x < 0.0 || x > 1.0)
00957             {
00958                 throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException("x", String.Format(Resources.ArgumentInIntervalXYInclusive, "0.0", "1.0"));
00959             }
00960 
00961             double bt = (x == 0.0 || x == 1.0)
00962                 ? 0.0
00963                 : Math.Exp(GammaLn(a + b) - GammaLn(a) - GammaLn(b) + a * Math.Log(x) + b * Math.Log(1.0 - x));
00964 
00965             bool symmetryTransformation = (x >= (a + 1.0) / (a + b + 2.0));
00966 
00967             // Continued fraction representation
00968 
00969             const int MaxIterations = 100;
00970             double eps = Number.RelativeAccuracy;
00971             double fpmin = Number.SmallestNumberGreaterThanZero / eps;
00972 
00973             if(symmetryTransformation)
00974             {
00975                 x = 1.0 - x;
00976                 double swap = a;
00977                 a = b;
00978                 b = swap;
00979             }
00980 
00981             double qab = a + b;
00982             double qap = a + 1.0;
00983             double qam = a - 1.0;
00984             double c = 1.0;
00985             double d = 1.0 - qab * x / qap;
00986 
00987             if(Math.Abs(d) < fpmin)
00988             {
00989                 d = fpmin;
00990             }
00991 
00992             d = 1.0 / d;
00993             double h = d;
00994 
00995             for(int m = 1, m2 = 2; m <= MaxIterations; m++, m2 += 2)
00996             {
00997                 double aa = m * (b - m) * x / ((qam + m2) * (a + m2));
00998                 d = 1.0 + aa * d;
00999 
01000                 if(Math.Abs(d) < fpmin)
01001                 {
01002                     d = fpmin;
01003                 }
01004 
01005                 c = 1.0 + aa / c;
01006                 if(Math.Abs(c) < fpmin)
01007                 {
01008                     c = fpmin;
01009                 }
01010 
01011                 d = 1.0 / d;
01012                 h *= d * c;
01013                 aa = -(a + m) * (qab + m) * x / ((a + m2) * (qap + m2));
01014                 d = 1.0 + aa * d;
01015 
01016                 if(Math.Abs(d) < fpmin)
01017                 {
01018                     d = fpmin;
01019                 }
01020 
01021                 c = 1.0 + aa / c;
01022 
01023                 if(Math.Abs(c) < fpmin)
01024                 {
01025                     c = fpmin;
01026                 }
01027 
01028                 d = 1.0 / d;
01029                 double del = d * c;
01030                 h *= del;
01031 
01032                 if(Math.Abs(del - 1.0) <= eps)
01033                 {
01034                     if(symmetryTransformation)
01035                     {
01036                         return 1.0 - bt * h / a;
01037                     }
01038 
01039                     return bt * h / a;
01040                 }
01041             }
01042 
01043             throw new ArgumentException(Resources.ArgumentTooLargeForIterationLimit, "a,b");
01044         }
01045 
01046         #endregion
01047 
01048         #region Error Functions
01049 
01053         public static
01054         double
01055         Erf(
01056             double x
01057             )
01058         {
01059             if(double.IsNegativeInfinity(x))
01060             {
01061                 return -1.0;
01062             }
01063 
01064             if(double.IsPositiveInfinity(x))
01065             {
01066                 return 1.0;
01067             }
01068 
01069             return x < 0.0
01070                 ? -GammaRegularized(0.5, x * x)
01071                 : GammaRegularized(0.5, x * x);
01072         }
01073 
01085         public static
01086         double
01087         ErfInverse(
01088             double x
01089             )
01090         {
01091             if(x < -1.0 || x > 1.0)
01092             {
01093                 throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException("p", x, String.Format(Resources.ArgumentInIntervalXYInclusive, "-1.0", "1.0"));
01094             }
01095 
01096             x = 0.5 * (x + 1.0);
01097 
01098             // Define break-points.
01099             double plow = 0.02425;
01100             double phigh = 1 - plow;
01101 
01102             double q;
01103 
01104             // Rational approximation for lower region:
01105             if(x < plow)
01106             {
01107                 q = Math.Sqrt(-2 * Math.Log(x));
01108                 return (((((erfinv_c[0] * q + erfinv_c[1]) * q + erfinv_c[2]) * q + erfinv_c[3]) * q + erfinv_c[4]) * q + erfinv_c[5]) /
01109                     ((((erfinv_d[0] * q + erfinv_d[1]) * q + erfinv_d[2]) * q + erfinv_d[3]) * q + 1)
01110                     * Constants.Sqrt1_2;
01111             }
01112 
01113             // Rational approximation for upper region:
01114             if(phigh < x)
01115             {
01116                 q = Math.Sqrt(-2 * Math.Log(1 - x));
01117                 return -(((((erfinv_c[0] * q + erfinv_c[1]) * q + erfinv_c[2]) * q + erfinv_c[3]) * q + erfinv_c[4]) * q + erfinv_c[5]) /
01118                     ((((erfinv_d[0] * q + erfinv_d[1]) * q + erfinv_d[2]) * q + erfinv_d[3]) * q + 1)
01119                     * Constants.Sqrt1_2;
01120             }
01121 
01122             // Rational approximation for central region:
01123             q = x - 0.5;
01124             double r = q * q;
01125             return (((((erfinv_a[0] * r + erfinv_a[1]) * r + erfinv_a[2]) * r + erfinv_a[3]) * r + erfinv_a[4]) * r + erfinv_a[5]) * q /
01126                 (((((erfinv_b[0] * r + erfinv_b[1]) * r + erfinv_b[2]) * r + erfinv_b[3]) * r + erfinv_b[4]) * r + 1)
01127                 * Constants.Sqrt1_2;
01128         }
01129 
01130         private static double[] erfinv_a = {
01131             -3.969683028665376e+01, 2.209460984245205e+02,
01132             -2.759285104469687e+02, 1.383577518672690e+02,
01133             -3.066479806614716e+01, 2.506628277459239e+00
01134             };
01135 
01136         private static double[] erfinv_b = {
01137             -5.447609879822406e+01, 1.615858368580409e+02,
01138             -1.556989798598866e+02, 6.680131188771972e+01,
01139             -1.328068155288572e+01
01140             };
01141 
01142         private static double[] erfinv_c = {
01143             -7.784894002430293e-03, -3.223964580411365e-01,
01144             -2.400758277161838e+00, -2.549732539343734e+00,
01145             4.374664141464968e+00, 2.938163982698783e+00
01146             };
01147 
01148         private static double[] erfinv_d = {
01149             7.784695709041462e-03, 3.224671290700398e-01,
01150             2.445134137142996e+00, 3.754408661907416e+00
01151             };
01152 
01153         #endregion
01154 
01155         #region Harmonic Numbers
01156 
01164         public static
01165         double
01166         HarmonicNumber(
01167             int n
01168             )
01169         {
01170             if(n < 0)
01171             {
01172                 throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException("n", Resources.ArgumentNotNegative);
01173             }
01174 
01175             if(n >= HarmonicPrecompSize)
01176             {
01177                 double n2 = n * n;
01178                 double n4 = n2 * n2;
01179                 return Constants.EulerGamma
01180                     + Math.Log(n)
01181                     + 0.5 / n
01182                     - 1.0 / (12.0 * n2)
01183                     + 1.0 / (120.0 * n4);
01184             }
01185 
01186             return harmonicPrecomp[n];
01187         }
01188
